content: from designer *i spotted the most beautiful ball of yarn at my local michaels craft store a few weeks ago i discovered that caron big cakes has added a few new colors to their line-up and this one summer berry tart really caught my eye and with just one ball i created a triangle shawl i used the moss stitch single_crochet + chain 1 which is such a simple beautiful stitch unlike a traditional single_crochet where you can see a defined front and back of the stitch the moss stitch allows for perfect little v s on both sides which makes your project completely reversible plus the self-striping nature of caron big cakes lends itself so well to this stitch and project * materials * one ball of caron big cakes yarn in summer berry tart * size h crochet hook * tapestry needle
